description:
Come on Apple, the 30% Apple tax is all fun and games… until you target me!
Join the SAMTIME Patreon to see my rant: https://www.patreon.com/posts/real-thoughts-30-110395924

Apple will be charging all Patreon creators the 30% Apple Tax for patrons who sign up through the iPhone App.
ARTICLE: https://www.inc.com/jason-aten/with-its-move-to-collect-30-percent-from-patreon-users-apple-keeps-alienating-users-it-says-it-values-most.html

title: Apple is Taking 30% of My Patreon Money
